definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Objective To study the receptor mechanism of anti-convulsant effect of Caoguo Zhimu Decoction (CZD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥草果知母湯抗癇作用的受體機制。

sentences.english: The recipient bladder and donor bladder patch were then anastomosed.
sentences.chinese: 供體膀胱瓣與受體膀胱全層縫合。

sentences.english: Abstract The cardioprotective effects of estrogen are mediated by receptors expressed in vascular cells.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素心血管效應是由心血管細胞表達的受體介導的。

sentences.english: The mating type genes in B loci contain multiple pheromone and pheromone receptors.
sentences.chinese: 而B位點的交配型基因編碼信息素及其受體。

sentences.english: Our previous study found that this effect of adenosine was mediated by adenosine A2A-receptor.
sentences.chinese: 我們的研究發現這一作用是由腺苷A2A受體介導的。

sentences.english: These processes are also influenced by the vascularity and composition of the host bed.
sentences.chinese: 這些過程也受受體牀的血運以及結構的影響。

sentences.english: Agonist is one kind of veterinary.
sentences.chinese: 受體激動劑是獸藥的一種。

sentences.english: The binding site of diethylstilbestrol may be oestrogen receptor on sperm surface.
sentences.chinese: 乙烯雌酚作用部位可能與精子雌激素受體有關。

sentences.english: This was further evidence that the increase in receptors might affect learning.
sentences.chinese: 這就進一步證明了受體增加可能影響到學習能力。

sentences.english: The distribution pattern of binding proteins for PrPc is similar with that of PrPc in brain.
sentences.chinese: 朊蛋白與其受體在腦組織中分佈相似。

sentences.english: By this means, receptors can transport immunoglobulins across epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 通過這種方式，受體能穿過上皮細胞傳輸免疫球蛋白。

sentences.english: You need a donor and you need an acceptor.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一個電子供體和電子受體。

sentences.english: After cholinergic M receptor was blockaded, the above parameters were decreased.
sentences.chinese: 受體被阻斷後，胃電活動及腦腸肽呈下降趨勢。

sentences.english: Heterocyclic compounds which modulate cannabinoid receptors are presented.
sentences.chinese: 提供了調節大麻素受體的雜環化合物。

sentences.english: The effect of adenosine is blocked by adrenergic receptor blockers.
sentences.chinese: 腎上腺素受體阻斷劑部分或全部阻斷腺苷的作用。

sentences.english: Leptin receptor deficient mice do not know the feeling of fullness.
sentences.chinese: 廋素受體缺乏的小鼠不知道飽脹感。

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

definition: stress/abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4 ji1 fan3 ying4]
